headline: CloudZero Announces Two Key Hires: Scott Castle As Chief Product Officer And Eric Weiss As SVP Of Engineering To Accelerate Cloud And AI Cost Optimization
summary: CloudZero, the global leader in proactive cloud cost efficiency, today announced the hiring of Scott Castle and Eric Weiss, two seasoned technical leaders with a combined five decades of experience at tech staples including Snowflake, Netflix, Workday, Adobe, Tecton, and more. Eric Weiss will serve as CloudZero's SVP of Engineering, and Scott Castle will serve as CloudZero's Chief Product Officer.

headline: High Growth Tech Stocks In The US For January 2026
summary: As of January 2026, the U.S. stock market is experiencing a period of volatility, with major indices such as the Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 closing lower amid investor concerns over inflation data and earnings reports from key financial institutions. Despite these fluctuations, high-growth tech stocks continue to capture attention due to their potential for innovation and resilience in adapting to evolving economic conditions; identifying strong candidates often involves...
